titles.title: Streamline Pentagon Budgeting Act of 2022
Streamline Pentagon Budgeting Act of 2022
To streamline the budget process at the Department of Defense.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Streamline Pentagon Budgeting Act of 2022
This bill repeals reporting requirements related to the unfunded priorities of the (1) armed force or forces or combatant command, and (2) the Missile Defense Agency.
